member.name: M:Nito.AsyncEx.EnlightenmentVerification.EnsureLoaded
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the correct platform enlightenment provider has been loaded.

member.name: F:Nito.AsyncEx.Internal.PlatformEnlightenment.AsyncEnlightenment.DenyChildAttach
member.summary: The TaskCreationOptions.DenyChildAttach value, if it exists; otherwise, 0.

member.name: F:Nito.AsyncEx.Internal.PlatformEnlightenment.ExceptionEnlightenment.CaptureAndThrow
member.summary: A delegate that will call ExceptionDispatchInfo.Capture followed by ExceptionDispatchInfo.Throw, or null if the ExceptionDispatchInfo type does not exist.

member.name: F:Nito.AsyncEx.Internal.PlatformEnlightenment.ExceptionEnlightenment.PrepForRemoting
member.summary: A delegate that will call Exception.PrepForRemoting, or null if the method does not exist. This member is always null if is non-null.

member.name: M:Nito.AsyncEx.Internal.PlatformEnlightenment.ExceptionEnlightenment.TryAddStackTrace(System.Exception)
member.summary: Attempts to add the original stack trace to the collection.
member.param: The exception. May not be null.
